mapper.select: SELECT LS_CODE, LS_NAME, (SELECT CS_NAME FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE=TRAINER_MEMBER_CODE) as CS_NAME, LS_TYPE, LS_DATE, date_part('hour', LS_TIME::timestamp) as LS_TIME, LS_CAPACITY, LS_CURRENT_APPLICANTS, LS_CONTENT, CENTER_CODE, LS_REGISTRATION_DATE, LS_CLOSE_YN FROM TBL_LESSON

SELECT LS_CODE, LS_NAME, (SELECT CS_NAME FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE=TRAINER_MEMBER_CODE) as CS_NAME, LS_TYPE, LS_DATE, date_part('hour', LS_TIME::timestamp) as LS_TIME, LS_CAPACITY, LS_CURRENT_APPLICANTS, LS_CONTENT, CENTER_CODE, LS_DATE, LS_CLOSE_YN FROM TBL_LESSON WHERE LS_CODE=#{lsCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LESSON(LS_CODE, LS_NAME, LS_TYPE, LS_DATE, LS_TIME, LS_CAPACITY, TRAINER_MEMBER_CODE, LS_CONTENT, CENTER_CODE, LS_REGISTRATION_DATE, LS_CLOSE_YN) VALUES (CONCAT('LS', NEXTVAL('SEQ_LESSON')), #{lsName}, #{lsType}, #{lsDate}, to_timestamp('${lsTime}', 'HH24:00'), #{lsCapacity}, #{trainerMemberCode}, #{lsContent}, 111, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, ${lsColseYN})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_LESSON SET LS_CLOSE_YN=${lsColseYN} WHERE LS_CODE=#{lsCode}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CS_MEMBER_CODE, CS_NAME FROM TBL_CST WHERE CS_MEMBER_CODE > 8000 AND (CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE1 = 111 OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE2 = 111 OR CONNECTED_CENTER_CODE3 = 111)
